items.name: Garlic Bread
items.description: Crispy, buttery bread topped with garlic and herbs.

items.name: Bruschetta
items.description: Grilled bread topped with tomatoes, basil, and balsamic glaze.

items.name: Mozzarella Sticks
items.description: Breaded mozzarella cheese sticks served with marinara sauce.

items.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
items.description: Pasta served with a rich, savory meat sauce.

items.name: Chicken Alfredo
items.description: Grilled chicken with a creamy Alfredo sauce over pasta.

items.name: Margherita Pizza
items.description: Classic pizza topped with mozzarella, fresh basil, and tomato sauce.

items.name: Grilled Salmon
items.description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled to perfection, served with vegetables.

items.name: Tiramisu
items.description: Classic Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.

items.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
items.description: Warm chocolate cake with a gooey molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.

items.name: Cheesecake
items.description: Rich and creamy cheesecake with a graham cracker crust.

items.name: Iced Tea
items.description: Freshly brewed iced tea, served with lemon.
